AzureAd.ClientId: Client Id of the API app
AzureAd.Audience: Custom App ID URI for your web API, not needed if you've accepted the App ID URI proposed by the app registration portal
AzureAd.ValidIssuers: Comma separated list of tenant identifiers, e.g. https://sts.windows.net/490789ec-b183-4ba5-97cf-e69ec8870130/,https://sts.windows.net/f418e7eb-0dcd-40be-9b81-c58c87c57d9a/
